question:
Consider the following:
  1. Swabhimaan campaign
  2. Banking Accounts with overdraft facility
  3. RuPay Credit Card
Which of the above is/are included in Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY)?
explanation: Third statement is incorrect because no credit card facility is available only RuPay Debit card and RuPay Kisan card are available. "Swabhimaan" campaign of the Government of India aims to bring banking services to large rural areas. It was through help of Business Correspondents.
